ref.div: Claypool, G., Lorensen, T. D., Johnson, C. A. Authigenic carbonates, methane generation, and oxidation in continental rise and shelf sediments, ODP leg 188, Sites 1165 and 1166, Prydz Bay, Offshore Antarctica (Prydz Bay). In: Proceedings of the Ocean Drilling Programme, Scientific Results (Ocean Drilling Program, Texas A&M University, College Station, TX77845-9547, U.S.A. 2003).
